title: How to Prepare Cellophane Noodles

steps.headline: Prepare a bowl that is large enough to take the cellophane noodles.
steps.description: Pour in enough warm water to cover the noodles.

steps.headline: Put the cellophane noodles into the bowl to soak.
Leave to soak for about 15 minutes.
steps.description: They will soften in the warm water.

steps.headline: Use a pair of kitchen shears or kitchen scissors, or a sharp knife, to cut the softened threads to the desired length.
Use them in a recipe as required.
steps.description: They are now ready to be added straight to a dish as directed by the recipe.

text: Prepare a bowl that is large enough to take the cellophane noodles. Pour in enough warm water to cover the noodles. Put the cellophane noodles into the bowl to soak.  Leave to soak for about 15 minutes. They will soften in the warm water. Use a pair of kitchen shears or kitchen scissors, or a sharp knife, to cut the softened threads to the desired length.  Use them in a recipe as required. They are now ready to be added straight to a dish as directed by the recipe. Finished.
